realtime_memories.content: Portfolio website for Asha Sreenivasan - HR Assistant/Candidate Experience Specialist seeking remote work after layoff from People Science. Site serves dual purpose: showcase HR/People Operations experience + South Indian culinary catering business (biryani specialty, 50-100+ guests). Domain: ashasreen.com. Contact: asreeniv3@gmail.com

Next.js 14+ App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Vercel hosting. @phosphor-icons/react (duotone weight) - NEVER React Icons or Lucide. Dark mode via useState + useEffect (NOT useSyncExternalStore). Google Fonts: Playfair Display (headings) + Inter (body).

Primary color: coral #f26959 (NOT gold). Warm & professional aesthetic. Mobile-first. Dark mode defaults to LIGHT on first visit. Dark mode uses darker blacks: #0D0D0D (backgrounds), #1A1A1A (cards), #2D2D2D (borders). NEVER use emojis - use Phosphor icons instead.

Confident, professional tone (not just job-seeking). Emphasize expertise in HR coordination, ATS management, stakeholder communication. Culinary: accomplished caterer with 1M+ views, 50-100+ guest events. Resume: /public/resumes/asha-sreenivasan-resume-jan-2026.pdf. Headshot: /images/headshot-coral.jpeg

YouTube: @ashasculinaryworld (~4,500 subscribers, 1M+ views). Instagram: @ashasculinaryworld (~1,000 followers). LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/asha-sreenivasan-1a810114b/. Testimonials carousel on culinary page with platform icons.

Full dark/light mode with toggle (syncs React state with DOM on mount). Contact form with inquiry type selector. Testimonials carousel with auto-rotation. CoreCompetencies and SpecialtiesSection components. All inline SVGs replaced with Phosphor icons. Constants extracted to module-level. TypeScript interfaces throughout. TESTIMONIALS_GUIDE.md for collecting social testimonials.
Memory consolidated: 10 â†’ 6 entries. Removed partial messages/responses, updated design_preferences with dark mode hex values, and completed_features with the dark mode fix.
